text:
Currently the examples are organized as follows:

```
examples/01_plotting             examples/plot_haxby_simple.py
examples/02_decoding             examples/plot_localizer_simple_analysis.py
examples/03_connectivity         examples/plot_nilearn_101.py
examples/04_manipulating_images  examples/plot_python_101.py
examples/05_advanced             examples/README.txt
```

Why the 01_, 02_, etc. prefix in basename of subdirectories ? This naming was probably done for a reason, but looks really weird.
title: Strange organisation of examples

text:
It's to control the ordering in sphinx gallery. 

Sent from my phone. Please forgive brevity and mis spelling

On Feb 29, 2016, 12:26, at 12:26, DOHMATOB Elvis notifications@github.com wrote:
